bill.title: Relating to public procurement modernization; prescribing an effective date.
bill.description: Establishes Task Force on Public Procurement Modernization. Establishes Task Force on Public Procurement Modernization. Specifies membership of task force. Requires task force to thoroughly examine state's public procurement processes and practices, compare state's processes and practices with best processes and practices from other states, evaluate innovative methods and technologies for conducting public procurements and make recommendations for any needed changes to state's public procurement processes and practices that will improve public procurement system while adhering to state's policies with respect to sound and responsive public contracting system. Sunsets December 31, 2024. Takes effect on 91st day following adjournment sine die.
